title: Jean’s Website
text:
Hi, I’m Jean Cui, a Business Analyst passionate about transforming data into strategic insights.
I’m currently pursuing a Master of Science in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University, where I focus on solving real-world problems through data storytelling, machine learning, and business strategy.

title: About Me
text:
I’m a passionate Business Analyst with a strong enthusiasm for uncovering data-driven insights and a knack for strategic thinking.
Currently pursuing a Master of Science in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University, I’m sharpening my skills in transforming complex datasets into actionable solutions that drive meaningful business outcomes.

title: About Me
text:
I’m a passionate Business Analyst with a strong enthusiasm for uncovering data-driven insights and a knack for strategic thinking.
Currently pursuing a Master of Science in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University, I’m sharpening my skills in transforming complex datasets into actionable solutions that drive meaningful business outcomes.

title: About Me
section: 💡 What I Bring to the Table
text:
💡 What I Bring to the Table
With hands-on experience across industries — from FMCG and banking to AI — I have contributed to:

📊 Data analysis & visualization (SQL, Python, R, Power BI, Tableau)

📈 Market research & strategic planning

⚙️ Process optimization & automation

☁️ Cloud-based analytics (AWS)

These experiences have taught me how to navigate dynamic environments, balance analytical precision with creative problem-solving, and communicate insights that influence decision-makers.

title: About Me
text:
🎯 My Career Goal
My goal is to bridge the gap between data and decision-making, empowering organizations to achieve their strategic objectives through informed insights.
I thrive in collaborative, forward-thinking teams, and I’m especially excited about projects that use data to tackle real-world challenges in business, sustainability, and innovation.

title: About Me
text:
🤝 Let’s Connect
I’m always open to conversations, collaborations, and new opportunities.
Feel free to reach out on my contact page or connect with me on LinkedIn.

“Turning data into clarity, and clarity into action.”

title: Projects
text:
A curated selection of my major academic and professional projects in data analytics, product development, and innovation.



Duration: Nov 2022 – Jun 2023
Tech Used: R Studio, Excel, Clustering Analysis
Awards: 🏆 2nd Prize – 9th ‘Internet+’ Innovation Competition
Publication: 📘 Tourism and Photography (2023)

Developed a virtual classroom focused on VR/AR-enhanced teaching of Red Tourism history. Applied R for data visualization and clustering, designed user feedback tracking in Excel, and co-authored a research paper on the commercial application of VR in education.





Duration: Jun 2023 – Aug 2023
Tech Used: SQL, Python (Pandas, NumPy), ML

Participated in a supply chain digitization initiative, categorizing product test data using SQL and applying internal network data for ML-based automation. Also analyzed experimental data from over 10 product types and designed qualification standards to optimize pass rates.





Duration: Jun 2021 – Aug 2021
Tech Used: R Studio, Power BI, AWS, Excel

Conducted field research and cleaned large-scale market data. Used R Studio to create visualizations, built business intelligence dashboards in Power BI, and stored data securely using AWS cloud services. Supported personalized product development based on client feedback.





Duration: Jul 2022 – Aug 2022
Tech Used: Excel (Power Query), RFID, LPR

Helped optimize traffic congestion by contributing to the ETC (Electronic Toll Collection) project. Used RFID transponders and License Plate Recognition (LPR) to enable seamless toll collection. Analyzed customer data in Excel to improve targeting of banking services.
